document.full_text: jim qualls, remembered as the man who broke up tom seaver's perfect game in 1969, is one of many former players who will benefit modestly from a new financial agreement.
document.title: sports of the times: far from perfection, but closer to vindication
lines_and_colors: jim qualls, remembered as the man who broke up tom seaver's perfect game in 1969, is one of many former players who will benefit modestly from a new financial agreement.
